title: Classic Spaghetti Carbonara
cooking_method: Cook spaghetti until al dente. In a separate pan, fry pancetta until crispy. Whisk eggs, pecorino cheese, and black pepper in a bowl. Drain cooked spaghetti and mix it with the egg mixture. Add crispy pancetta. Serve hot.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
cooking_method: Marinate chicken in yogurt and spices. Grill until cooked. In a separate pan, saut√© onions and add tomato sauce and garam masala. Simmer and add cooked chicken. Serve with naan or rice.

title: Vegetable Stir-Fry
cooking_method: Stir-fry vegetables and tofu in a wok with soy sauce. Cook until tender. Serve over rice or noodles.

title: Chocolate Chip Cookies
cooking_method: Cream butter and sugar, add eggs, mix in flour, and fold in chocolate chips. Drop spoonfuls on a baking sheet and bake until golden brown.

title: Mango Lassi
cooking_method: Blend mango, yogurt, milk, sugar, and a pinch of cardamom until smooth. Serve chilled.

title: Caprese Salad
cooking_method: Slice tomatoes and mozzarella. Layer with fresh basil leaves. Drizzle with olive oil and balsamic vinegar. Season with salt and pepper.
